title: Ontology
description: An ontology as recorded by Ontohub

iri.description: The unique identifier for an ontology

acronym.description: Acronym of the name of the ontology

description.description: A short description of the ontology

documentation.description: Includes a reference (usually a URI) to a documentation resource

evaluation_state.description: The current state of the evaluation of the ontology

basepath.description: The path to the ontology relative to the git repositories root directory

file_extension.description: Actual file extension of the ontology file in the repository

ontology_versions.description: Reference to all ontology versions of this ontology

symbols.description: Reference to all symbols of this ontology

sentences.description: Reference to all sentences of this ontology

mappings.description: Reference to all mappings defined by this ontology
